status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"94otd","text":"Dissect the cortex/hippocampus and separate and remove the soft membrane and blood vessels.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5l3te","text":"Collect all the cortices/hippocampus in    PBS   . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2j8u8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"F3B400C01FE711EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FBF6DF001FE711EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5rh5a","text":"Transfer the cortices/hippocampus to a 15 ml tube containing    trypsinâ€“EDTA (0.25%) and incubate at    for   , gently shake every  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":101,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":108,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":131,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6d8nh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"9","error":false,"guid":"138F10101FE811EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1E28AF901FE811EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"2310CA101FE811EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"39CE79A01FE811EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8og5k","text":"Dissociate the cortices/hippocampus by triturating with a 10 mL serological pipette 10â€“15 times, or until no chunks are left.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3kkho","text":"Centrifuge the dissociated cortices/hippocampus at 1500 rpm for  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"df7h9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"5359EF301FE811EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cv6ml","text":"Resuspend the pellet in   DMEM high glucose with 10% FBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2g3af","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"58D5E5401FE811EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1ldj4","text":"Triturate the cell suspension 10 times with a 1ml pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b18tt","text":"Centrifuge at 1500 rpm for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a0bek","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"67F35F301FE811EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9se57","text":"Resuspend the pellet in   Neurobasal-A Medium with 2% B-27 Supplement (50X).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fpb0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"6FF9F7C01FE811EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5ihpd","text":"Count the cells and plate in 12 well plate 450.000/well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ctm24","text":"Change medium after   (4 days).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2bum4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":345600,"guid":"7B5A69B01FE811EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2g2nd","text":"Dissect and collect the brains in ice cold HBSS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"essk0","text":"Dissect their embryos and collect in ice cold HBSS (no phenol red, no Ca/Mg).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ebtjf","text":"Kill pregnant mice (E15-17) by CO2 intoxication and cervical dislocation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":33,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1kmis","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqlu3","text":"Reconstitute in   4mL distilled sterile water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a5o2a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"309B07901FED11EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"52gdk","text":"Aliquot   and store at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9euas","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"25FCD4301FED11EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2AAF11A01FED11EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6t76d","text":"Wash x3 with sterile water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"979hl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f09g9","text":"Incubate the coverslips with Poly-D-Lysine (  /12well plate) for    in incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8m2dv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"F966CC001FEC11EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"FFD07D701FEC11EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"brdk0","text":"Sterilize autoclaved coverslips under UV for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"atds1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"092F53001FED11EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6cr6p","text":"Dilute the    aliquot in    PBS no Ca/mg.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cij1f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"15C893101FED11EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"1D06D2901FED11EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54k2d","text":"Add    Neurobasal A to the well and place in incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1j817","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"AEF2E4101FEC11EDBF7EE7564930614A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7a8h0","text":"Dry out under the hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fm8qm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9r956","text":"When neurons are at DIV7 proceed with PFF infection  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3tung","text":"N.B: If PFFs are added at DIV10 the aggregation is quicker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5g9l6","text":"Dilute 5mg/mL PFFs to 0.1mg/mL (20uL PFF+980uL PBS).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7pirq","text":"Sonicate at amplitude 20% for a total of 60 pulses (0.5 seconds on/off cycle). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkp4s","text":"Pause briefly between every 10-12 pulses to prevent solution from heating up excessively and to avoid frothing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8c3h","text":"Let it settle for  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1qgm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"BC98018022EF11EDAD74CF12CDE4E6C7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3ii14","text":"Dilute to 1ug/mL (50uL PFFs+5mL neurobasal NB).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1ijbt","text":"Filter in a 0.2um filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"38s8l","text":"Replace completely the medium in well with NB+PFFs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eue1q","text":"Incubate with PFFs for 10 days replacing half of the medium every 3 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
